Reviews.Title: Amazing Product and service!
Reviews.Author: Ck172
Reviews.Content: Mac works great even though it is a late model! Would recommend to anyone who just wants a simple computer and can't fork out the hefty price for a new one. Far exceeds my expectations everyday:-) Very Happy.

Reviews.Title: 100% disappointed
Reviews.Author: john buskirk
Reviews.Content: Not only was my $310+ MacBook 7 days late than what was promised but also after giving it to my son as a LATE X-mas gift, the laptop died after only working properly for THREE days. I immediately called the company (East Coast Macs out of NC) nine times. I never received a call back so had no choice but to take the laptop in to Simply Mac to get fixed. It was my priority to get it working before my son went back to school. $266 later, it has a new hard drive in it since the other one was a bust. Therefore, I learned an expensive, frustrating lesson and will never order ANYthing refurbished again from any company that I'm not completely familiar with. I will also advise everyone else against it, too. Very unfortunate.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: M. Biggers
Reviews.Content: great price, great product! it's like brand new. i had this same computer back in 2008, then upgraded to macbook pro. when my macbook pro broke, i was broke, so i bought a used macbook. love it!

Reviews.Title: Took my money and ran!
Reviews.Author: Michael Robinson
Reviews.Content: Zachary Bender (Owner) of East Coast Macs, is a crook.  I ordered this exact MacBook on December 26, 2013 and he created the shipping label but FedEx said he did not take the product to their facility for shipment.  I have contacted him regarding my purchase and I found a lot of complaints regarding his business practice on BBB, eBay and other websites.  I would steer far from EVER doing business with this person unless you want to be taken for a ride. It is really unfortunate because this was the computer my daughter picked out for Christmas. No good can come from anyone who steals from another. SMH!

Reviews.Title: One was purchased for me from BetaMacs
Reviews.Author: Terry Hammerstone
Reviews.Content: wonderful...very much impressed...fast, easy to use. I upgraded it to OS X lion and it works quickly and competently. I am very impressed. Worked perfectly and looked brand new. Purchased from BetaMacs and very impressed.

Reviews.Title: MacBook
Reviews.Author: Bernie Smith
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent buy but the DVD- Drive didn't work. The computer was okay for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: ETemperance
Reviews.Content: Fantastic, arrived early and in great condition. Works perfectly. Very satisfied! Buying refurbished is the way to go! Good for the environment, and great price.

Reviews.Title: Vintage imac laptop Apple MacBook13" Intel Core Duo 1.83ghz, 2GB Hard Drive, Wi-fi,...
Reviews.Author: Lynn Rossini
Reviews.Content: Unsuspecting buyers of computers beware, and do your research before purchasing a computer. This company DID NOT use the word VINTAGE to list the lap top that they advertised FOR SALE, on AMAZON. Thus, when I received it in mid October of 2013, it appeared to be a good thing. However, by late December, the pin hole that lights up on the power cord that plugs into the laptop, to indicate that the power cord is charging the battery in the PC, began intermittently not lighting up. I thought that the power cord needed replacing, because the light on the cord, at the power source on the laptop stopped lighting up at all. I found out via the net that a place in CA, had a cord to sell me ha ha. The place shipped the cord, and I received it in a weeks time. The problem seemed remedied, for about a month, but then I had the same problem, only this time the battery went dead. So, I purchased a battery from Amazon.com where I purchase just about everything I own. This remedied the problem for a short time until the power cord again stopped lighting up. I took the imac lap top to the Apple Store. A technician there told me that the power source was most likely burned out, and that on this model laptop that I had bought the power sources on them burned out on average about every  two years. GREAT! I told the Apple tech that before the machine had lost power, there was another problem w/it. The disk drive was grinding with a music CD in it that I had put into the drive to listen to music on. The tech told me that meant I needed an entire new hard drive! And guess what????? When I asked about getting parts from Apple, they told me that they no longer sell parts for that particular VINTAGE model laptop PC. I tried to contact other places that sell PC parts, but they all said that they do not sell parts for my vintage apple laptop. So why did I not just go directly back to the Seller and talk to them. BECAUSE as soon as they took my money on my AMAZON charge card, they cut all lines of communication. And, when I looked their number up online, I was told that they do not sell computers on AMAZON.com  Well, maybe not, because even the Customer Service Representatives, at Amazon were unable to reach the seller. Regrettably, I neglected to do my homework. Amazon and it's seller's can not always be depended upon to make things that are WRONG right for customers. Therefore: BUYERS BEWARE

Reviews.Title: Functions well
Reviews.Author: Jesse Mensah
Reviews.Content: A relative's recommendation made my buy this product and this was money well spent, It works will with any type of software I try and run, and is in good working order, although the battery might need to be changed

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Apple Laptop
Reviews.Author: susie
Reviews.Content: This was a case of misrepresentation. I bought this laptop as a gift and thought it would be clean and look new. What a disappointment because it was faded in color and dirt at the seams. I called the company to complain and the agent hung up on me. Joyce T. Mitchell

Reviews.Title: Very happy!
Reviews.Author: Elise Criscitello
Reviews.Content: I orderd the MacBook for my 11 year olds birthday, the 23rd of December. I had never orderd a used computer before. I was a bit nervous that it wouldn't work, and that there would be no time to send it back. Well, I got exactly what I wanted. It works perfect! Great transaction!

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: charles
Reviews.Content: GREAT COMPUTER FOR GENERAL BROWSING WIFE LOVES IT, THIS COMPUTER RUNS FAIRLY QUICK AND DOES EXACTLY WHAT IT SAID IT WOULD DO....

Reviews.Title: Great Delivery! All programs already installed!
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: My mom and I bought this for my brother for Christmas. He said he didn't want us to spend an arm and a leg on a new computer but he wanted a Mac. This was a great price and also had all the programs: Microsoft Word installed already which is great since that could take hours to do and is super expensive. I did have to update the software on it as it was old but that was easy. The computer was delivered very timely and in good condition! I turned it on and everything is working just fine! I would definitely purchase from this seller again in future!

Reviews.Title: MacBook 13"
Reviews.Author: BADGIRL
Reviews.Content: This came in great shape.  It was a gift for my son, and I gave it to him early and he was about to cry.  Loved it and couldn't wait to start playing around.

Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: Diana S. Thovmasian
Reviews.Content: This computer came in at perfect condition! I would highly recommend this buyer to others. Fast delivery. I bought this computer because I didn't want to spend a lot of money on a new apple, but needed a new laptop.

Reviews.Title: Happily surprised
Reviews.Author: Reese Washington
Reviews.Content: I needed a new comp, however as a ft student, and ft worker I knew whatever I got would need to last and I wanted a apple product. I ordered this MacBook and thinking it would be beat up and scratched up, when it arrived (4days early), I was like this looks brand new. I have just completed my medschool hw and did some research, and I am so glad I got a great product great price, and yes it was the the most exp option but I thank God I chose it. Thank yall!!! oh yeah thanks for the neg comments about the seller that made me so nervous.

Reviews.Title: My New (Used) Apple Computer
Reviews.Author: Christine Moore
Reviews.Content: I was and still am very impressed with this product. Also we ordered it on a Friday and received it the very next Monday!! My daughter was so excited! We thought it would take 7 to 10 business days and it didn't even take 3!!  Very great experience with this seller!!

Reviews.Title: The last notebook you'll need
Reviews.Author: Brett B.
Reviews.Content: Apple surpasses all competitors with a solid notebook. With no Anti-virus software to hassle with, you just use it and it just works, every time.

Reviews.Title: First time buyer
Reviews.Author: Tyron Gardner
Reviews.Content: I never ordered a computer used before so I was a litte nervous. Once I received it was happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: It was an awesome buy. I use it for school and everything, so far so good no problems and it works great for a great price.

Reviews.Title: My Comments...
Reviews.Author: Constance Franklin
Reviews.Content: The MacBook is functional, however, there are still a few areas I need to repair (I'm not sure if it's the AC adapter or the battery that needs to be replaced). And I probably need a new fan for it as well. Other than that, it is really good computer and I got what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: 'Nuff Said
Reviews.Author: Brian Forehand
Reviews.Content: I chose 5 stars because I received exactly what was listed. The difference between 1.83 GHz and 2.24 GHz hasn't been a concern for me as mid level user, The display is nice, battery life is merely ok but hey its from 2008.

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Cecil Moore
Reviews.Content: Your item is great. I found a minor little chip in the corner however it was received on time and its working fine..... All I really could ask for. Thanks. I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Item arrived 6 days late but good deal if you have patience dealing with innacurate info from sellers
Reviews.Author: Joseph Merkel
Reviews.Content: I thought this might happen after reading reviews but hoped for the best! No tracking meant "Not Shipped" in this case. After delivery date passed, a phone call got the ball rolling. After listening to some bogus explanations and how the shipping industry works, I received an email with tracking numbers and MacBook arrived. Although the optical drive is inop, the rest of the hardware is fine. My 9 year old daughter loves it. I'll replace the optical drive myself.

Reviews.Title: Excellent..
Reviews.Author: fadhlan
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful laptop I have ever had for Macbook. It is fantastic and much better than I expected before regarding to the price..

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: Rose
Reviews.Content: I love this mac it has everything I need for school I have to AAA+ this is awesome mac! My experience just today is great got to download Mozilla Firefox which I had older version I had to return it would not download Mozilla Firefox at all.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Charlie21
Reviews.Content: Didn't expect it to even wrk for 239.00... it was like brand new so happy I bought it used from beta thanks guys

Reviews.Title: In Heaven
Reviews.Author: Truthful
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this Apple Laptop. It is giving me a opportunity to experience what other people are doing with their laptops. I have always owned a Apple desktop, but this is growing on me for the light convenience of a portable carry. Thank You Amazon for great Sellers.

Reviews.Title: Smooth and easy!
Reviews.Author: sunshine girl
Reviews.Content: Great MacBook for the price! The dealer was extremely prompt in his response when the original item had issues. Replaced it right away - overall a smooth and satisfying experience..ll I would definitely buy again from this dealer!

Reviews.Title: MacBook 13" etc.
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Hopkins
Reviews.Content: It arrived quickly, was exactly as represented in the ad, all systems go. I was finally able to restore my ipod, which I couldn't do on my other Mac. It was a little too expensive, but having a laptop which was lightly used is great, as it is one which newer ones wouldn't do for me. I would buy another Mac from Amazon. Sorry MacMall!

Reviews.Title: Appel Computer
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: Computer not working properly. Shuts down for no apparent reason when in use. For an apple computer it's a good price.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Zach K.
Reviews.Content: Seems to work great. I got it as a gift for my little brother. No issues. Buying used computers is the way to go!

Reviews.Title: it sucks
Reviews.Author: tania sandoval
Reviews.Content: it comes with carvings on the back and it is just so slow and that is why i sent it back

Reviews.Title: very Good product
Reviews.Author: Sebastian Salinas
Reviews.Content: Very Good product, Mac is fast and easily to use, I happy to buy this product. Everithing its OK .

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop!
Reviews.Author: Jace D.
Reviews.Content: I really love this laptop because even though it is old and used it works like new. The deals that Beta Macs offer are a steal! I honestly believe you cannot find used a used Macbook in prestine condition like the one I have purchased. I love the all white casing because it just look really clean and especially when you customize it with a sticker decal it looks pimp! This laptop is faster then a Samsung laptop I purchased 3 years ago. Believe it or not this is my first Macbook purchase and I completely satisfied with the quality it has to offer. I am of cheap laptops and how they tend to slowdown within a year or two. I highly recommend this Macbook and guarantee you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: good but not great
Reviews.Author: taffy gleason
Reviews.Content: This is actually the second one I received from this company as the first one they sent me had a bad hardrive and didn't work at all.The company wasn't as helpful as they could have been and were quite defensive that I must have done something wrong and so it was frustrating to deal with them. I've been using macs for 20 years personally and professionally and know what I'm doing too.The worst part is that I was leaving on an overseas trip within a week and needed a computer. They eventually did send me a new one and I got it in time for my trip which I was truly grateful for.I don't know if it is due to a different electrical output or what but this computer has issues. It freezes, shuts down, the screen gets so dark I have to shut it down and let it rest for an hour or so before I use it again. It's Ok about 3/4 of the time, but I'm not real impressed with it. It's getting the job done, but when I get back in the states, I will buy something else.

Reviews.Title: Macbook
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: Nice Macbook but has more cracks then a fat laddy Butt .. 300.00 shouldn't be full of cracks BS shipping sucks . says comes with apple power cord charger it didn't came with a nock off brand say's battery holds charge no more then a house .. this place sucks never buy from them again ....

Reviews.Title: Well Done!
Reviews.Author: Thomas S.
Reviews.Content: The MacBook 13" has met our expectations because it came in good condition, performs well, and was priced to suit our needs. That is why the product rates a 4 Star review. The service and attention to customer satisfaction, however, was outstanding at a 5 Star level! We were very pleased with the customer care we experienced from the vendor eSales Connect!

Reviews.Title: Minor Flaws, great computer!
Reviews.Author: Dannythemanly
Reviews.Content: Ordered this from Esalesconnect. They shipped outstandingly fast. The computer came in, and like as the promised was ready to use out of the box. The computer had very minor scratches that you cannot see unless you're within 5 inches of the computer. The only thing that disappointed me was the battery, it has battery life of only about an hour and 15 minutes. They assumed that it was a good battery? It's not a huge issue because the computer runs well plugged in and a new replacement battery can be bought for around 20 dollars on here. There was also some discoloring on the track pad, it was sort of a yellowish, the color a white shoe gets when it's worn and dirty. It's not that big of an issue either. Overall the computer runs well and nothing is wrong with its performance. Very pleased with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Apple MacBook white 2004-06 edition
Reviews.Author: Micheal Ross
Reviews.Content: Good machine great piece to start exploring the world of Apple. Let's you use a lot of the features used today in current machines. No complaints here.
